mutants.code:
import re

def remove_words(dataset, words_to_remove):
    for i in range(len(dataset)):
        sentence = dataset[i]
        for word in words_to_remove:
            sentence = re.sub('\\b{}\\b'.format(word), 'MUTATED', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub('^{}\\b'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub('\\b{}$'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub('\\W{}\\W'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
        dataset[i] = sentence
    return dataset

import re

def remove_words(dataset, words_to_remove):
    for i in range(len(dataset)):
        sentence = dataset[i]
        for word in words_to_remove:
            sentence = re.sub('\\b{}\\b'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub('^{}\\b'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub('\\b{}$'.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
            sentence = re.sub(''.format(word), '', sentence, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
        dataset[i] = sentence
    return dataset
